attributes.action: Prevent car manufacturers  installing  high intensity head lights to new vehicles
attributes.additional_details:
Many new cars  have extremely bright  headlights, daytime running lights, spot lights, turning lights,  some of which can all be switched on simultaneously.

These bright lights are potentially dangerous  and  can dazzle   other drivers  and destroy their night vision  temporarily.

Please ask the Motor Industry Research  Laboratory  to investigate this problem.
